summary.value: The ship has a spirit of her own, and this is the best place to listen to her.

data.haunt: The Hauntee becomes a construct, gaining vulnerability to lightning, and immunity to poison and the poisoned condition. They cannot cast Spells except through Magispheres, for which they do not need to pay the IP cost.
data.ritual: Projects get +2 progress each day someone works on them here.
